chat.Please_set_your_OpenAI_API_key_in_the_bo: Please set your OpenAI API key in the bottom left of the sidebar.
chat.If_you_dont_have_an_OpenAI_API_key_you_c: If you don't have an OpenAI API key, you can get one here:
chat.You_are_ChatGPT_a_large_language_model_t: You are ChatGPT, a large language model trained by OpenAI. Follow the user's instructions carefully. Respond using markdown.
chat.Type_a_message_or_type_to_select_a_promp: Type a message or type to select a prompt
chat.Make_sure_your_OpenAI_API_key_is_set_in_: Make sure your OpenAI API key is set in the bottom left of the sidebar.
chat.If_you_completed_this_step_OpenAI_may_be: If you completed this step, OpenAI may be experiencing issues.
chat.click_if_using_a_env_local_file: click if using a env local file
chat.Message_limit_is: Message limit is {{maxLength}} characters. You have entered {{valueLength}} characters.
chat.Chatbot_UI_is_an_advanced_chatbot_kit_fo: Chatbot UI is an advanced chatbot kit for OpenAI's chat models, aiming to mimic ChatGPT's interface and functionality.
chat.Are_you_sure_you_want_to_clear_all_messa: Are you sure you want to clear all messages?
chat.Higher_values_like_0_8_will_make_the_out: Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.
chat.Enter_a_prompt_or_type: Enter a prompt or type "/" to select a prompt...

promptbar.Prompt_content_Use: Prompt content. Use {{}} to indicate a variable. For example: {{name}} is a {{adjective}} {{noun}}
